scripts.buildlib: cat src/version.js src/image.js src/sound.js src/param.js src/touch.js > ./pico.js
scripts.buildapp: mkdir -p ../${npm_config_name} && cp pico.* ../${npm_config_name} && cp index.* ../${npm_config_name} && cp app/${npm_config_name}.js ../${npm_config_name}/app.js && cp app/${npm_config_name}.json ../${npm_config_name}/app.json
scripts.build: npm run buildlib && npm run buildapp --name=${npm_config_name}
